verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* which came unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Go|strong="H1980"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w Rechabites|strong="H7397"\w*, and \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto them, and \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* them into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, into \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w*, and give them \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* to \w drink|strong="H8248"\w*.

Then I \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Jaazaniah|strong="H2970"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Habaziniah|strong="H2262"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and all his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and the whole \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w Rechabites|strong="H7397"\w*;

And I \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, into the \w chamber|strong="H3957"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hanan|strong="H2605"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Igdaliah|strong="H3012"\w*, a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which \add was\add* \w by|strong="H0681"\w* the \w chamber|strong="H3957"\w* of the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, which \add was\add* \w above|strong="H4605"\w* the \w chamber|strong="H3957"\w* of \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w*, the \w keeper|strong="H8104"\w* of the \w door|strong="H5592"\w*:\f + \fr 35.4 \ft door: Heb. threshold, or, vessel\f*

And I \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w Rechabites|strong="H7397"\w* \w pots|strong="H1375"\w* \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, and \w cups|strong="H3563"\w*, and I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Drink|strong="H8354"\w* ye \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*.

But they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, We will \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* no \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*: for \w Jonadab|strong="H3122"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Rechab|strong="H7394"\w* our \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* us, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye shall \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* no \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \add neither ye\add*, nor your \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:

Neither shall ye \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, nor \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, nor \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, nor have \add any:\add* but all your \w days|strong="H3117"\w* ye shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*; that ye may \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* where ye \add be\add* \w strangers|strong="H1481"\w*.

Thus have we \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w Jonadab|strong="H3082"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Rechab|strong="H7394"\w* our \w father|strong="H0001"\w* in all that he hath \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* us, to \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* no \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* all our \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, we, our \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, our \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, nor our \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*;

Nor to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* for us to dwell \w in|strong="H3427"\w*: neither have we \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, nor \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, nor \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*:

But we have dwelt \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*, and have \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w*, and \w done|strong="H6213"\w* according to all that \w Jonadab|strong="H3122"\w* our \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* us.

But it came to pass, when \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, that we \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Come|strong="H0935"\w*, and let us \w go|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* for \w fear|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w army|strong="H2428"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, and for \w fear|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w army|strong="H2428"\w* of the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w*: so we \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.
¶ Then came the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w Go|strong="H1980"\w* and \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, Will ye not \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w* to \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* to my \w words|strong="H1697"\w*? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

The \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Jonadab|strong="H3082"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Rechab|strong="H7394"\w*, that he \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* not to \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, are \w performed|strong="H6965"\w*; for unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* they \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* none, but \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* their \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w*: notwithstanding I have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* unto you, rising \w early|strong="H7925"\w* and \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w*; but ye \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not unto me.

I have \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* also unto you all my \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, rising up \w early|strong="H7925"\w* and \w sending|strong="H7971"\w* \add them\add*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Return|strong="H7725"\w* ye now every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* from his \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and \w amend|strong="H3190"\w* your \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*, and \w go|strong="H3212"\w* not \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* them, and ye shall dwell \w in|strong="H3427"\w* the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* to you and to your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*: but ye have not \w inclined|strong="H5186"\w* your \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, nor \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto me.

Because the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jonadab|strong="H3082"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Rechab|strong="H7394"\w* have \w performed|strong="H6965"\w* the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* of their \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, which he \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* them; but this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* hath not \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto me:

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; Behold, I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* upon \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and upon all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* all the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* that I have \w pronounced|strong="H1696"\w* against them: because I have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* unto them, but they have not \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*; and I have \w called|strong="H7121"\w* unto them, but they have not \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*.

¶ And \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w Rechabites|strong="H7397"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; Because ye have \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* of \w Jonadab|strong="H3082"\w* your \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* all his \w precepts|strong="H4687"\w*, and \w done|strong="H6213"\w* according unto all that he hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* you:

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w Jonadab|strong="H3122"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Rechab|strong="H7394"\w* shall not \w want|strong="H3772"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me for \w ever|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 35.19 \ft Jonadab…: Heb. There shall not a man be cut off from Jonadab the son of Rechab to stand, etc\f*
